product_name: Coleman Soap Dish / Toothbrush Holders - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Camp hygiene just got better with the Coleman Soap Dish and Toothbrush Holders set. It includes 2 toothbrush covers with hanging lanyards and a soap dish with suction-cup feet.
